comment: this class was so much fun.  It is two and a half hours long once a week but PRof. Wilson made it fun!!  Make sure you read the book and powerpoints and come to class.  Attendance is 20% of your grade.

You will enjoy her class. She does a great job explaining the content and encourages her students to be their best. She's really funny and makes every class interesting. Attendance is a must and it helps if you come to class prepared and read. I just hope she still gets to teach at this school.

I absolutely loved Professor Wilson. She was very understanding and tried her best to make the material interesting. Returned work in a very timely manner and provided helpful feedback. She also always made herself available

She is very helpful and clear on what is expected.  She is highly concerned about the success of each of her students.  she like a lot of class participation.  Take her class and you will be satisfied.
